Implements the IReadFromDatabase interface for database read operations. public class ReadFromDatabase : IReadFromDatabase Inheritance object ReadFromDatabase Implements IReadFromDatabase Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors ReadFromDatabase(AppDbContext) Initializes a new instance of the ReadFromDatabase class with the specified database context. public ReadFromDatabase(AppDbContext context) Parameters context AppDbContext The Entity Framework database context used for data access operations. Methods Read() Reads all word pairs from the database. public IEnumerable<WordPair> Read() Returns IEnumerable<WordPair> An enumerable collection of WordPair objects containing all word translations from the database.
